short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that allows you to view comments that indicate the current playback time on YouTube.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you install this extension and watch a YouTube video, you can also see comments pointing to the current time.

main features:

- You can close a comment by clicking on it.
- You can pop up the setting window by clicking the extension list in the upper right corner.
- In the settings window, you can turn the feature on or off or set the transparency of comments.
- You can adjust the duration for comments to pop up.
- You can set the number of messages to appear on the screen at once.
